timeline.content:
Hi Elizabeth Rodgers, üòä

I hope you're doing well! üåü

I'm Aashutush from the UCL Accommodation Portal. I've been trying to get in touch with you regarding the interest you showed in one of the properties,London Nest Lady Margaret, London  . üè°

Could you please let me know a good time for us to connect? Looking forward to hearing from you! ‚ú®

Thanks a lot! üòä

Best regards,
Ashutush

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: The call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang out.
Speaker A: Hello? Hi, Elizabeth Ashutosh, this Saeed from UCL Accommodation Portal and this call is regarding your recent inquiry about one of our properties, which is Londoners. Lady Margaret. I am also dropping you a text over WhatsApp. I hope to hear back from you. And the properties are getting sold out, so I hope you can come from as soon as possible so that we can get a good room for you. Thank you. Have a nice day.
